Text.Page: Rhodos, Paesyn, and <PCNAME> continued to pursue Dakuryon, but found Zolyn's flower coronet instead.

Let's spread out to find Dakuryon.

Perhaps your dog-friend can assist you. He seems most eager.

! I can help! I made a truth serum!

Beat up one of their officers and use the serum to make them talk. It will help us save Zolyn!

Your feeble magic can't overcome my loyalty to Dakuryon!

Your mission is doomed!

It seemed like a vine unlikely to bloom, but we had to try.

No time to waste. Upstairs!

, look what I foundâ€¦

It's the coronet I gave her.

Zolyn's here!
